title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Steelers/Browns TNF Reaction + 'Sharp or Square' Week 3 NFL Picks
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Steelers/Browns TNF Reaction + 'Sharp or Square' Week 3 NFL Picks
description:
Colin reacts to the Browns Thursday Night win against the Steelers, and why Pittsburgh needs to figure out their QB immediately. (3:00)

Then the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 3 picks are "sharp" or "square". They look at Raiders/Titans (7:00), Commanders/Eagles (9:00), Jags/Chargers (10:00), Falcons/Seahawks (11:00), Cowboys/Giants (19:00), Niners/Broncos (21:00), Ravens/Patriots (25:00), and Colts/Chiefs (27:00), Bucs/Packers (29:00).

Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd #volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
